system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.A8Fjrud3BxPaycCT]{Black Powder Firearm Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.RfcniyS07Zabga8J]{Black Powder Firearm Specialist}

Benefits

When reloading a black powder weapon, the Combat Point cost is 2 less, the error range when using a black powder weapon is 10% less, and any black powder weapon that is loaded by the character will not explode if it fails the Error Range Check
system.summary: Faster firing and reloading, -10% ER, no explosions
